name: Leave The Prison Text Adventure Game
name_original: Leave The Prison Text Adventure Game
description: Leave The Prison is a short text adventure game that takes a funny unrealistc twist to the common short Escape The Prison games. There are 6 different endings but in only one of them are you completely free. This is my first game and it took me 3 days to build. (It probably could've gone a lot faster if I was more programming savvy, which I hope to become in the near future.) Let me know what you thought of my game in the comments below. Donations are appreciated and go torwards my effort to build a new pc so that I can develop more complex games as my $200-$300 laptop is barely capable of running any 3d games. (I spelled congratulations wrong multiple times in this game and probably some other stuff too I realize that now i got lazy torwards the end and didn't feel like checking it.)
